item.title: Absorbing Changes into a Commit Series with Mercurial
item.description: Imagine this scenario. You’ve pushed a large series of commits to your favourite review tool (because you are a believer in the glory of microcommits). The reviewer however has found several problems, and worse, they are spread across all of the commits in your series. How do you fix all the issues with minimal fuss while preserving the commit order?
